sn35.115:1.1: “Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.115:1.2: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati—
sn35.115:1.3: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu baddho cakkhuvinneyyesu rupesu, avasagato marassa, marassa vasam gato, patimukkassa marapaso.
sn35.115:2.2: santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.115:2.3: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati—
sn35.115:2.4: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu baddho manovinneyyesu dhammesu, avasagato marassa, marassa vasam gato, patimukkassa marapaso.
sn35.115:3.1: Santi ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.115:3.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati—
sn35.115:3.3: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mutto cakkhuvinneyyehi rupehi, navasagato marassa, na marassa vasam gato, ummukkassa marapaso.
sn35.115:3.4: Mutto so marabandhanena na yathakamakaraniyo papimato …pe….
sn35.115:4.2: santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.115:4.3: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati—
sn35.115:4.4: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mutto manovinneyyehi dhammehi, navasagato marassa, na marassa vasam gato, ummukkassa marapaso.
sn35.115:4.5: Mutto so marabandhanena na yathakamakaraniyo papimato”ti.
